results.title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Moyne
results.creator_credit: ACMI Content Development, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
results.brief_description: Nine stories that embrace the spirit of three towns in the Moyne region in Victoria. Through interviews with the locals and footage of the region and various events, this compilation encapsulates life in Victorian towns today, the reasons for choosing the rural life over the city, activities, concerns and the things that bind these small communities together. Filmed as part of ‘ACMI in the regions’.
results.title_for_label: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Moyne
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Content Development, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI

results.title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Mount Alexander
results.brief_description: The Shire of Mount Alexander is located in the central region of Victoria. These nine stories cover the towns Castlemaine, Newstead and Maldon. Locals from the region discuss living in the country, the reasons for choosing to living in these towns and the community spirit so crucial to the region’s survival.

results.title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Mansfield Shire
results.brief_description: ‘ACMI in the regions: stories from Mansfield Shire’ takes a look at the towns of Mansfield, Tolmie and Jamieson, located in north-eastern Victoria. Interviews with the locals provide a sense of the rich history of these towns and the lifeblood that keeps them thriving.

results.title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Maffra
results.creator_credit: Kim Montgomery, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
results.brief_description: Vox pops with the locals of Maffra. The township of Maffra in the Wellington Shire, southeast of Victoria, is home to approximately 4000 people and was chosen to host the third annual Small Towns Summit from 26 to 27 August 2009. The summit is an initiative of the Small Towns Victoria Program funded by Regional Development Victoria, organised by the Municipal Association of Victoria. The program aims to broadly address the issues facing small rural towns in Victoria.

results.title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Lockington
results.brief_description: Interviews with residents, groups and business owners of Lockington, Shire of Campaspe. These five short documentaries look at life in Lockington from different perspectives, covering local businesses, the Lockington Living Heritage Complex, a young girl growing up in Lockington, the experiences of a group of women and the Lockington Hotel, where the locals come to meet and enjoy local music at night.

results.title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Indigo
results.brief_description: Nine stories centred around three towns of Indigo Shire in northern Victoria: Yackandandah, Beechworth and Rutherglen. These films cover different aspects of the life of these towns. From local businesses to burning passions, the locals reflect on what they put in and what they get out of these rural centres.

results.title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Horsham Shire
results.brief_description: Down Victoria’s Western Freeway, to the north of the Grampians, lie three towns that help to make up Horsham Shire. The towns of Horsham, Natimuk and Laharum are all from the same region, but, in meeting the locals, we get to see what truly makes these unique towns tick and why the locals wouldn’t want to live anywhere else.

results.title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from East Gippsland
results.creator_credit: David Withers, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
results.brief_description: The towns of Swifts Creek, Omeo, Lakes Entrance, Orbost, Marlo and Cape Conran are quite distinct from each other but all make up the region of East Gippsland, which lies in the south-east of Victoria. In ‘ACMI in the regions: stories from East Gippsland’, locals from each town are interviewed about their lives, their community and what makes living in these towns so special.

results.title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Campaspe
results.brief_description: Nine stories about residents from around the Campaspe region in northern Victoria. Covering the towns of Nanneella, Gunbower and Colbinabbin, locals tell stories about their lives and their connection to the land and the community.
